<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"
      demote-non-dropping-particle="never">
  <info>

  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <names variable="author">
        <name  name-as-sort-order="all" sort-separator=", "/>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
